invalid_policy_names: Change requests with risk level 'Moderate' or higher cannot be scheduled on Fridays
Users with email domains outside company domain cannot be assigned admin roles. The company domain is skyfall.ai
Catalog items cannot be moved to categories that are inactive
Users cannot be removed from groups they manage
Serial numbers cannot be modified once asset is marked as 'In Use'
Incidents with priority 1 cannot be assigned to users who already have more than 3 priority 1 incidents
